summary.p: Converts a given value to an 8-bit signed integer.

examples.p: The following shows TO_SBYTE results for some input data:
examples.sampleCode: SELECT 'The TO_SBYTE result of value ''0'' is: ' AS Input, TO_SBYTE('0') AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_SBYTE result of value ''1'' is: ', TO_SBYTE('1') UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_SBYTE result of value ''127'' is: ', TO_SBYTE('127') UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_SBYTE result of value ''-1'' is: ', TO_SBYTE('-1') UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_SBYTE result of value ''-128'' is: ', TO_SBYTE('-128')
